thread.section_title: Dumont NYC-an Affinia hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Dumont NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Noelia C
title: Great location
text: We went on vacations. The location of the hotel is the best you can get; it's quite expensive but we got a great price online. It should definitely be able to offer free wifi not only at the lobby, every other hotel does. The daily fee is also something I don't agree with. If we are able to get a good price in the future we will be pleased to go back
